review: After owning a Google Chromecast, as well as an AppleTv, and a Roku, I have to say I'm fairly impressed with the power this little stick packs.  For the cost of entry, it's a fantastic device, and interacts with the my Plex server flawlessly.  I was even able to get an app (for a very small fee) that allows me to AirPlay from my iPad, and there are some great games being developed for this platform.  Well done Amazon!
author: B. Willette "Amazon Addict"

review: I love this tool. It is one of my best gifts that I gave myself. If you own a Amazon Fire, you need to buy the Fire TV Stick. I own a HD TV without wifi and no Ethernet connection. The HDTV is working fine with the Fire Stick. I was able to connect ESPN & FOXs Sports apps to my Verizon Fios subscription. I have instant updates on all types of sports all in one click. The miracast on my Fire Phone interface with the FIre Stick on my HDTV that is attached to the TV. The Fire Stick has Games, Instant videos, Apps and all types of things easily displayed on my HDTV.  In addition, the FIre Phone could be used as a remote like the Fire Stick too. You could bypass the HDTV smart  connection with FIre Stick on any HDTV.  My next purchase will be the games accessory.
